About me

Bio

My name is Jon and I'm a Web Developer living in Oxfordshire. I'm a passionate and ambitious developer, who wants to help companies grow through the use of modern and innovative technologies, particularly using front-end tech like Javascript and SASS. While I love development and design, I'm also comfortable using back-end tech including Python (and Flask), Express and MongoDB. Outside of web development, I enjoy reading (I'm a massive fan of Brandon Sanderson), binging a good boxset and spending time with my family.
